item.title: SR: Psychological Game Theory in Hustle (UK)
item.description: This post is a first Tv Serial review, the first being Season 1 of Hustle, a UK TV series from 2004. As far as I know, this serial is the only one I have seen in a long time where the actors make direct eye-contact with the viewers–as if to let us in on the con they are playing. The team is a pot-pourri crew of friends from some ‘olden days’, each of whom possesses a unique con talent: they’re like objects in programming; each object capable of their own behaviours and possessing unique data (attributes).
